about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure in this RPG, with action, survival, crafting and base-building! Arriving in new lands, far from known civilization and with only a mysterious pendant, how will you survive and thrive? Build a homebase? Adventure into the wild to discover valuable resources? Fight your way to hidden treasures? The choice is yours in the quest for the Stoneheart.


Explore and Collect Resources

  • Explore diverse environments.
  • Search for ancient treasures.
  • Grow and collect resources across an ever-expanding area of influence.


Craft, Build, Action

  • Craft impressive tools, armor and weapons.
  • Discover powerful gems and craft them into equipment to enhance your playstyle.
  • Build villages with the inhabitants and protect them from threats.
  • Attack evil creatures lurking above and below the ground.



Character and Equipment Customisation

  • Select from a range of player characters.
  • Choose and customise equipment from a huge variety of unique items.
  • Gain experience and develop your character's skills.


Free Updates and Expansions

Free map expansion, new characters and creatures, and new items will be regularly added to the game. Then embark on new adventures!
